Row.Text: MAGIC_SNOW's provide an early defense against attackers. Though they are less expensive than walls, they provide only half the defense.

Built of little more than mud and raw lumber MAGIC_SNOWs were as vulnerable to the weather as they were to enemy attack. Yet they remained popular in border cities if only because they made the people behind them feel more secure.
MAGIC_POWDER's provide an early defense against attackers. Though they are less expensive than walls, they provide only half the defense.

Built of little more than mud and raw lumber MAGIC_POWDERs were as vulnerable to the weather as they were to enemy attack. Yet they remained popular in border cities if only because they made the people behind them feel more secure.
FAIRY_DUST's provide an early defense against attackers. Though they are less expensive than walls, they provide only half the defense.

Built of little more than mud and raw lumber FAIRY_DUSTs were as vulnerable to the weather as they were to enemy attack. Yet they remained popular in border cities if only because they made the people behind them feel more secure.
SAND_OF_TIME's provide an early defense against attackers. Though they are less expensive than walls, they provide only half the defense.

Built of little more than mud and raw lumber SAND_OF_TIMEs were as vulnerable to the weather as they were to enemy attack. Yet they remained popular in border cities if only because they made the people behind them feel more secure.
